channel.title: Euro-Scape Hiring
channel.description:
Euro-Scape
About
Euro-Scape is being made for the pvp part of runescape and also the ecomany.
lately ive been putting my server to test so far the best results are 3 weeks of uptime and no lagg issues it is hosted on a 12 gb ram dedicated server (core i7).
Developers:
* Steven aka me
[CENTER]Features
Green = Complete Orange = Under development Red = Not yet started
Euro-Scape Features
* Database - Handler o Full Player Loading Via Mysql o Full Player Saving Via Mysql o Mysql Clan Chat o Mysql Npc Spawns o Mysql Npc Emotes o Mysql Npc Drops * Skills o Woodcutting - Coded in python o Mining - Coded in python o Agility o Comabt Skills o Prayer o Firemaking - [URL=http://\"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WpAJMt3fSw4\"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WpAJMt3fSw4[/URL] o Thieving o Runecrafting * Items Ect o Custom Coded Random Drop System o Adding 474 Items * Minigames o Dueling o Barrows - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc[/url] o StayAlive - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4[/url] (its like 50x better now) o TeamPK o Fight Caves o Fight Pits o Assault o Pest Control o Clan Wars * Quests o Monkey Madness o Desert Tresure o Lost City o Dwaf Cannon * Combat o Pvp - 60% - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ[/url] o PvN - 70% o Magic - 80% - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc[/url] o Range - 70%[/CENTER] Update Logg. [QUOTE] Added FireMaking Added Dragon claws - [URL=http://\"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fq9s7s-XjGw\"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fq9s7s-XjGw[/URL] Combat Forumla And Timers Tweaked[/QUOTE]
Media. [QUOTE] Videos: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4[/url]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ppez5y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ytxjwm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/24eni36.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11udn3d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/otgcgw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35btcg1.png[/img] [/QUOTE]

item.title: Euro-Scape Hiring
item.dc:creator: @pkin3 pkin3
item.description:
@pkin3 wrote:

Euro-Scape

About

Euro-Scape is being made for the pvp part of runescape and also the ecomany.

lately ive been putting my server to test so far the best results are 3 weeks of uptime and no lagg issues it is hosted on a 12 gb ram dedicated server (core i7).

Developers:

* Steven aka me

[CENTER]Features

Green = Complete
Orange = Under development
Red = Not yet started

Euro-Scape Features

  • Database - Handler
    o Full Player Loading Via Mysql
    o Full Player Saving Via Mysql
    o Mysql Clan Chat
    o Mysql Npc Spawns
    o Mysql Npc Emotes
    o Mysql Npc Drops
    • Skills
      o Woodcutting - Coded in python
      o Mining - Coded in python
      o Agility
      o Comabt Skills
      o Prayer
      o Firemaking - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WpAJMt3fSw4
      o Thieving
      o Runecrafting
  • Items Ect
    o Custom Coded Random Drop System
    o Adding 474 Items
    • Minigames
      o Dueling
      o Barrows - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc
      o StayAlive - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4 (its like 50x better now)
      o TeamPK
      o Fight Caves
      o Fight Pits
      o Assault
      o Pest Control
      o Clan Wars
    • Quests
      o Monkey Madness
      o Desert Tresure
      o Lost City
      o Dwaf Cannon
    • Combat
      o Pvp - 60% - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ
      o PvN - 70%
      o Magic - 80% - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc
      o Range - 70%[/CENTER]
      Update Logg.

[QUOTE]
Added FireMaking
Added Dragon claws - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fq9s7s-XjGw
Combat Forumla And Timers Tweaked[/QUOTE]

Media.
